news.title: AstraZeneca is listing in New York, as Big Pharma balances the huge U.S. market with China's tempting innovation
news.summary: AstraZeneca announces multibillion dollar investments in China. Big Pharma is increasingly looking east for innovation. AstraZeneca is one of the biggest pharmaceutical companies in the world.

news.title: How the EV pullback is affecting factories and jobs in the South
news.summary: Hundreds of billions of dollars were funneled into EV-related manufacturing in the U.S. Now it's all in question. Automakers, suppliers and battery makers were funneling hundreds of billions in EV- related manufacturing.

news.title: U.S. government partially shuts down; House vote could reopen it by Monday
news.summary: The funding deal addresses concerns Democrats have about funding the Department of Homeland Security. Democrats have concerns about funding Homeland Security because of enforcement actions in Minnesota.

news.title: Everything you need to know about Kevin Warsh, Trump's pick to lead the Federal Reserve
news.summary: Kevin Warsh, a former Fed governor, has emerged as Donald Trump's pick to lead the Federal Reserve. Here’s his background, views and why it matters.

news.title: How Chinese short-video streaming firms are reshaping Latin America's media landscape
news.summary: Short-drama apps, many with Chinese origins, are making significant inroads in Latin America as the region becomes more affluent, research shows.

news.title: Warsh pick doesn’t end talk that Powell could stay on to defend the Fed’s independence
news.summary: Some Fed watchers say the choice of Warsh means it's more likely that Powell will continue to stand in Trump’s way.

news.title: A luxury ‘phobia’ is gripping these consumers. It’s a red flag for brands like Chanel and Gucci.
news.summary: In China, conspicuous consumption is out, and “local heroes’ are in. “Local heroes” are people who have lived in the area for years.

news.title: ‘I am the third trustee’: My selfish brother is executor of our family estate. Can I retitle property in my name?
news.summary: “I am not looking to hire an attorney,” he says. “I’m not looking for an attorney.”

news.title: ‘I’m rich in everything but parents’: I inherited $400K. Is it unwise to use this money to buy a house with my fiancé?
news.summary: “I’m a 40-year-old woman in a committed relationship, and I’ve experienced the loss of both of my parents,” she said.

news.title: ‘I feel like this does us a disservice’: My brother wants his $1 million inheritance in advance. Should he pay interest?
news.summary: “The total value of our family trust is $4 million,” the family says. “We’re very proud of what we’ve done.”
